scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build -w @crm/web && node tools/copy-web-dist.mjs && npm run prisma:generate -w @crm/backend && npm run build -w @crm/backend
scripts.start: npm run prisma:generate -w @crm/backend && npm run db:push -w @crm/backend && npm run db:init -w @crm/backend && node apps/backend/dist/main.js
scripts.db:push: npm run prisma:generate -w @crm/backend && npm run prisma:push -w @crm/backend
scripts.db:migrate: npm run prisma:generate -w @crm/backend && npm run prisma:migrate -w @crm/backend
